name: redux-interceptor
description: A Redux middleware for intercepting Redux actions for execution at a later time.

scripts.build:umd: $(npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/reduxInterceptor.js
scripts.build:umd:min: $(npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/reduxInterceptor.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
